hotels.title: Japan Yatsugatake Mountains Retreat 90 Minutes From Tokyo with Open-Air Onsen & Stargazing Deck
hotels.description: Breathe in the refreshing mountain air at this peaceful retreat, just a 1.5-hour drive from Tokyo. Nestled at the base of the Yatsugatake Mountains, this contemporary hotel offers the perfect setting for relaxation, boasting an onsen and rooftop Astronomical Dome where you can stargaze with views of Mount Fuji. Kids will delight in the indoor play area featuring a wooden jungle gym and plenty of outdoor adventures to discover. After a day of hiking, skiing or unwinding, retreat to your cozy room, indulge in local delicacies at the buffet restaurant and let the mountains work their charm.
